title: Efficiency, mechanism and application prospect of ammonium adsorption and desorption over a sodium-acetate-modified synthetic zeolite
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17843-17854
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01547A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Heng-Deng Zhou, Chu-Ya Wang, Qi Wang, Bo-Xing Xu, Guangcan Zhu
The NH4+ adsorption capacity of the modified synthetic zeolite was 27.46 mg g−1. Ion exchange accounted for 77.90% of adsorption process and 80.16% of desorption process. The modified synthetic zeolite rapidly adsorbed and slowly released NH4+ and showed promise as a soil amendment.
